email.success: We've sent you an email with a link to reset your password.
email.title: Reset Password Email

error.invalidResetToken: <0>The link has expired.</0> Please request a new one.
error.noPkceVerifier: <0>Unable to continue.</0> Please make sure to use the link in the browser from which you have requested the password reset email.

success: <0>Your password has been reset.</0> You can now continue to the application.
title: Reset Password
